You can create an AroonOscillator indicator that does not automatically update. This lets you update the indicator with any data you choose. The following reference table describes the AroonOscillator constructor.

AroonOscillator()1/2

            AroonOscillator QuantConnect.Indicators.AroonOscillator (
     int  downPeriod,
   )

Creates a new AroonOscillator from the specified up/down periods.

Parameters
int downPeriod The lookback period to determine the lowest low for the AroonUp.

Return

AroonOscillator - The new AroonOscillator indicator object.

Definition at line 53 of file Indicators/AroonOscillator.cs.

AroonOscillator()2/2

            AroonOscillator QuantConnect.Indicators.AroonOscillator (
     string  name,
     int     downPeriod,
   )

Creates a new AroonOscillator from the specified up/down periods.

Parameters
string name The name of this indicator.
int downPeriod The lookback period to determine the lowest low for the AroonUp.

Return

AroonOscillator - The new AroonOscillator indicator object.

Definition at line 64 of file Indicators/AroonOscillator.cs.


You can update the indicator automatically or manually.

Automatic Update

Create a consolidator and then call the RegisterIndicator method to update the indicator with the consolidated bars.


private AroonOscillator _aroon;

// In Initialize()
_aroon = new AroonOscillator(name, upPeriod, downPeriod);
_aroon.Updated += IndicatorUpdateMethod;

var thirtyMinuteConsolidator = new TradeBarConsolidator(TimeSpan.FromMinutes(30));
var symbol = AddEquity("SPY").Symbol;
SubscriptionManager.AddConsolidator(symbol, thirtyMinuteConsolidator);

RegisterIndicator(symbol, _aroon, thirtyMinuteConsolidator);

// In IndicatorUpdateMethod()
if (_aroon.IsReady)
{
    var indicatorValue = _aroon.Current.Value;
}
    
# In Initialize()
self.aroon = AroonOscillator(name, upPeriod, downPeriod)
self.aroon.Updated += self.IndicatorUpdateMethod

thirty_minute_consolidator = TradeBarConsolidator(timedelta(minutes=30))
symbol = self.AddEquity("SPY").Symbol
self.SubscriptionManager.AddConsolidator(symbol, thirty_minute_consolidator)

self.RegisterIndicator(symbol, self.aroon, thirty_minute_consolidator)

# In IndicatorUpdateMethod()
if self.aroon.IsReady:
    indicator_value = self.aroon.Current.Value

Manual Update

Updating your indicator manually enables you to control when the indicator is updated and what data you use to update it. To manually update the indicator, call the Update method that with a TradeBar, QuoteBar, or an IndicatorDataPoint. The indicator will only be ready after you prime it with enough data.

    
private AroonOscillator _aroon;
private Symbol symbol;

// In Initialize()
_aroon = new AroonOscillator(upPeriod, downPeriod);
symbol = AddEquity("SPY").Symbol;

// In OnData()
if (data.QuoteBars.ContainsKey(_symbol))
{
    _aroon.Update(data.QuoteBars[symbol]);
}
if (_aroon.IsReady)
{
    var indicatorValue = _aroon.Current.Value;
}
    
# In Initialize()
self.aroon = AroonOscillator(upPeriod, downPeriod)
self.symbol = self.AddEquity("SPY").Symbol

# In OnData()
if data.QuoteBars.ContainsKey(self.symbol):
    self.aroon.Update(data.QuoteBars[self.symbol])
if self.aroon.IsReady:
    indicator_value = self.aroon.Current.Value
